# React

<img style="width: 128px;" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," >

`@baloise/design-system-components-react` combines the core Baloise Design System experience with the tooling and APIs that are tailored to React Developers.

::: tip
Checkout our React example app with a form example, service and more. [React Example App](https://github.com/baloise/design-system/tree/master/examples/react)
:::
